mapper.select: select id, order_sn, order_id, alipay_trade_no, total_amount, subject, payment_status, create_time, confirm_time, callback_content, callback_time from oms_payment_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into oms_payment_info(order_sn, order_id, alipay_trade_no, total_amount, subject, payment_status, create_time, confirm_time, callback_content, callback_time) values (#{orderSn}, #{orderId}, #{alipayTradeNo}, #{totalAmount}, #{subject}, #{paymentStatus}, #{createTime}, #{confirmTime}, #{callbackContent}, #{callbackTime})

insert into oms_payment_info(order_sn, order_id, alipay_trade_no, total_amount, subject, payment_status, create_time, confirm_time, callback_content, callback_time) values
(#{entity.orderSn}, #{entity.orderId}, #{entity.alipayTradeNo}, #{entity.totalAmount}, #{entity.subject}, #{entity.paymentStatus}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.confirmTime}, #{entity.callbackContent}, #{entity.callbackTime})

insert into oms_payment_info(order_sn, order_id, alipay_trade_no, total_amount, subject, payment_status, create_time, confirm_time, callback_content, callback_time) values
(#{entity.orderSn}, #{entity.orderId}, #{entity.alipayTradeNo}, #{entity.totalAmount}, #{entity.subject}, #{entity.paymentStatus}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.confirmTime}, #{entity.callbackContent}, #{entity.callbackTime})
on duplicate key update order_sn = values(order_sn), order_id = values(order_id), alipay_trade_no = values(alipay_trade_no), total_amount = values(total_amount), subject = values(subject), payment_status = values(payment_status), create_time = values(create_time), confirm_time = values(confirm_time), callback_content = values(callback_content), callback_time = values(callback_time)
mapper.update:
update oms_payment_info
order_sn = #{orderSn},
order_id = #{orderId},
alipay_trade_no = #{alipayTradeNo},
total_amount = #{totalAmount},
subject = #{subject},
payment_status = #{paymentStatus},
create_time = #{createTime},
confirm_time = #{confirmTime},
callback_content = #{callbackContent},
callback_time = #{callbackTime},
where id = #{id}
